Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Harper
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie & #52A South Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/63rd Street
ShortDescription: SB 52 Kedzie & 52A South Kedzie buses are temp. rerouted via Kedzie, 63rd, California, Marquette, & Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/63rd Street.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52 Kedzie & #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 63rd, California, Marquette, & Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/63rd Street.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays from the area of Fullerton due to a mechanical problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays from the area of Fullerton due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
